alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central York, central Rockingham, southeastern Strafford and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Barrington to Brentwood to near Hudson. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Derry, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, Exeter, Kittery, Salem, Dover, Barrington, Epping, Brentwood, Greenland, Newington, Seabrook, Rye, Hudson, Pelham, Stratham, and Newmarket. This includes the following highways... Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Maine...and southern and central New Hampshire.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough
